attributes.action: Injunction to stop the press harrassing Will and Kate about the baby.
attributes.additional_details:
following the announcement of William and Kate's pregnancy, the press have been in a frenzy.
I believe the government need to enforce an injunction against the press, to stop their incessant and invasive intrusion into the royals' lives.
Yes, its in the public interest, but this is obviously a trying time for the couple; the added stress of the press watching their every move will not help.
Aside from official releases by the palace, I believe there should be a complete news black out on the subject.
